alert.note: Alert for Grant; West Otter Tail (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:25PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Otter Tail and northern Grant Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 224 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Western, or 8 miles southwest of Fergus Falls, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fergus Falls, Ashby, Underwood, Dalton, Erdahl and Western. This includes Interstate 94 in Minnesota between mile markers 55 and 80. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
